name: The One From Down There
description:
This is an interactive fiction and a platformer with some tricky mechanics that occasionally came into my mind. You may find the teleporting difficult to handle. So why not give a try?

Wizard boy: arrows to move, up to jump, down to interact/talk, hold space bar to attack. If you can't walk on, please try interacting or attacking.

Devil: arrows to move, hold left/right arrow and release to teleport. Hold the key longer to teleport farther. M to mute/unmute.

The game auto saves at each checkpoint. You may fail several times before reaching the next checkpoint. Good luck.
